date.contact: For reservations above {{max}} guests, please contact the place via <3>phone</3> or <5>e-mail</5>.

info.name: Name
info.comment_placeholder: Anything you'd like the place to know...
info.accept_tos: By pressing "Submit reservation" you accept our <2>Terms of Service</2> and <6>Privacy Policy</6>.

accepted.title: Reservation accepted
accepted.text: Your reservation has been accepted, and we've sent you an e-mail with the details. In case you'd like to alter your reservation, please contact the place.

pending.title: Reservation sent
pending.text: Your reservation has been sent, and we'll send you an e-mail once it's accepted. In case you'd like to alter your reservation, please contact the place.

error.title: Reservation failed
error.text: There was an unexpected error while processing your reservation, therefore it was unsuccessful. Please go back and try again.

paused.title: Place paused
paused.text: This place is not accepting reservations right now. Please try again later.

review.thankYou: Thank you for submitting your review, there is nothing more to do here.
review.tellMore: Tell us more about your reservation, please!
review.howHear: How did you hear about us?
review.completeMandatory: Please complete the mandatory fields before submitting, thank you!
review.thankTaking: Thank you for taking this quick survey!
review.anonymousText: Your identity will not be revealed!
